sanskrit_verse:
बीजस्य चैव योन्याश्च बीजमुत्कृष्टमुच्यते ।
सर्वभूतप्रसूतिर्हि बीजलक्षणलक्षिता ॥ ९.३५॥
transliteration:
bījasya caiva yonyāśca bījamutkṛṣṭamucyate |
sarvabhūtaprasūtirhi bījalakṣanalakṣitā || 9.35||
sph_interpretive_translation: That which is the source of all beings and is itself generated from a cause is called the Supreme Seed; it is identified by its characteristic mark of being the generative principle of all existence.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from the unmanifested generative source
Capacity-based responsibility arises from identification with the generative seed
Restoration logic aligns with回归 to the originating causal integrity
Consciousness alignment occurs through recognition of the Supreme Seed as self
executable_legal_axioms: IF entity X exhibits generative capacity over class Y THEN X bears restorative duty for integrity of Y
IF action A stems from misidentification with non-supreme seed THEN initiate completion process toward causal realignment
IF breach occurs due to lack of consciousness alignment THEN deploy reintegration protocol based on seed-recognition mechanism
IF jurisdictional conflict arises THEN resolve via ascending hierarchy to identifying the operative generative source
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving fundamental origins or constitutional authority, the court must identify the operative 'seed'—the originating causal factor—and ensure that judgments restore alignment with that generative source rather than impose punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality flows sequentially from the Supreme Seed; therefore, any deviation reflects misalignment而非罪过. Responsibility is determined by proximity to the generative source and corrected through conscious reconnection, not punishment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Seed Recognition Process to realign individual consciousness with Supreme Generative Principle
Deploy Completion Cycle to address residual karmic distortions obstructing causal clarity
Execute Reintegration Protocol to restore generative capacity in affected domains
Apply Consciousness Alignment Mechanism to dissolve false identifications causing disordered manifestation
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is declared: Justice flows from alignment with the Supreme Seed, restoration supersedes punishment, and consciousness alone is the ultimate adjudicator. All else is derivative.
